text:
In case anyone missed this announcement:
*Custom code actions in workflows now support Python.*
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Releases-and-Updates/Now-Live-Python-Support-in-Workflows/ba-p/543786>
All I want for Christmas is the ability to prevent sloppy writers from emailing 100k people in our system because there is no approval workflow of any kind for publishing mass communications.
Love this. Any plans to let us hide modules entirely?
turn off automatic emails for the blog. simple to do. Merry christmas
